sub_title: Financial Controller Directie Operatiën - Staf KorpsLeiding | Politie Nederland
summary: Experienced Finance & Business Advisor with a demonstrated history of working in the research industry. Skilled in Financial Management, Microsoft Excel, Budgeting & Forecasting, Microsoft Word, Financial Analysis, English, Risk Management, Microsoft PowerPoint, Problem solving and Process Management. Proactive teamplayer with advanced communication skills and a strong finance professional with a Bachelor focused in Business Economics, Finance and Accounting from Avans Hogeschool in Breda. Believes in efficiency, integrity and outstanding customer service.
